p: We took age adjusted vaccine efficacy estimates for each historical influenza season (2009/2010-2017/2018 inclusive) from publications detailing end-of-season seasonal influenza vaccine effectiveness in the United Kingdom [ 28â€“ 34]. In influenza seasons where equivalent publications were not available, we used mid-season or provisional end-of-season age adjusted vaccine efficacy estimates from PHE reports [ 35, 36].
